The energy efficiency loss related to the OER overpotential can be estimated from the difference between the OER plateau of the charge curves and the thermoneutral potential for OER of different samples (0.601 V vs. Hg/HgO cf. calculations in ESI â€ ):
6
where E TN(OER) is the thermoneutral potential of OER, and V OER is the potential of the OER plateau.
